techmeme.title: Sources: Shein's revenue growth slowed to 23% YoY to $18B in H1 2024 and its profit declined 70%+ YoY to just under $400M, as competition with Temu intensifies (The Information)
Texas Instruments says it is nearing recovery after sales fell for the eighth straight quarter in Q3 to $4.15B, down 8.4% YoY, and projects Q4 sales below est. (Ian King/Bloomberg)
Foursquare plans to sunset its City Guide app on December 15, 2024 to focus on check-in app Swarm, reversing a 2014 decision to split its services into two apps (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
Stream.Security, which offers real-time cloud threat and exposure management solutions for enterprises, raised a $30M Series B led by U.S. Venture Partners (Duncan Riley/SiliconANGLE)
Paytm receives regulatory approval to resume adding UPI payments users, following an eight-month Reserve Bank of India's restrictions on many of its operations (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
